STARSELL

Покупайте Telegram Stars дешевле

1. General Provisions

  • The service serves as an intermediary for purchasing stars on Fragment
  • By using the service, you confirm that you are 18 years old or above
  • We reserve the right to modify the terms at any time

2. Services

  • The service enables users to purchase Telegram stars
  • Minimum purchase amount: 50 stars
  • All transactions are final and non-refundable

3. Payment and Delivery

  • Payments must be made using the methods provided on the service at the time of order creation
  • Stars are credited after the transaction is confirmed
  • Crediting time depends on the processing speed of the TON network

4. Responsibility

  • We are not responsible for delays in the TON network's operation
  • Users must provide the correct Memo when making transfers
  • The service does not guarantee the availability of Telegram stars

5. Guarantee and Refund Policy

  • The Provider assumes full responsibility for delivering the Service. If the Service is not fully provided due to technical reasons, the User has the right to a refund equal to the cost of the undelivered Service.
  • The User agrees that after successfully completing the payment, they will not raise disputes or claims with payment aggregators.
  • Refunds are processed within 10 business days from the confirmation of the undelivered Service. Refunds are made to the payment details used for the transaction (bank card or e-wallet) or the payment system chosen by the User.
  • The User can request a refund within 14 days from the payment date by contacting the Provider at StarSell Support
  • If the User engages in suspicious or fraudulent activities, the Provider reserves the right to refuse the Service to the User.
  • Refunds can be requested through the website's support service.
  • The Provider is not responsible for payment aggregator fees but informs the User about potential fees.
  • Refunds are not issued if the Service was provided in full or for reasons beyond the Provider's control (e.g., the User provided incorrect data).

6. Restrictions

  • Using the service for illegal activities is strictly prohibited
  • We reserve the right to deny service to any user

7. Confidentiality

  • We collect only the data necessary to provide our services
  • User data will not be shared with third parties

8. Contact Information

  • For inquiries, contact us at: StarSell Support
  • Support response time: up to 24 hours

9. Disclaimer

  • The service is provided "as is"
  • We do not guarantee uninterrupted service
  • Users assume all risks associated with cryptocurrency use

By using this service, you automatically agree to these terms.
